abstract: Ad Age does the math on Murdoch’s threat to stiff Google.
snippet: Ad Age does the math on Murdoch’s threat to stiff Google.
lead_paragraph: In a recent interview, Rupert Murdoch, the head of News Corporation, said that the company was considering blocking the searchbots of Google, making its content invisible or at least less visible to the search giant. So far it’s only talk, but Advertising Age decided to do some math to look at the implications of such a move.

headline.main: Doing the Math on News Corp.’s Threatened Google Block
